fn.p: The authors declare that they have no competing interests.

GSM conceptualized, designed and coordinated the study, assembled the initial article draft, supervised its finalization, and managed the peer review process on the authors’ side. MB designed and performed the statistical analyses and health impact assessment, and contributed in the writing of the paper. KR conceptualized, designed and supervised the climate change modelling and its linkage with urban climate modelling. HH carried out the urban climate modelling and contributed in the writing of the paper. WL conducted the post-processing of Urbclim outputs. VK contributed to the interpretation of the results and the drafting of the background section. KS contributed to the interpretation of the results, coordinated inputs of all authors for drafting, and formatted text, tables, figures and references. MS acquired the data and coordinated contacts with national and local authorities in Skopje. All authors read and approved the final manuscript.
